data.text: @4lala Thanks. We finally both slept last night since we’re in our own room, so that’s a start! Now we prepare for surgery
@hkearl I am so sorry. I know how scary and stressful time in the ER and PICU are. 💜 Hoping surgery goes well. Will be keeping you all in my thoughts.

Well, for us this convo became less timely as he’s been at the hospital since that night and will continue to be until ~ march 12. He was at ER, ICU and now the regular floor, waiting for surgery on Monday. This is his life with #rarediseases :(

@hkearl Wishing you luck on this journey. We are also trying to explain to our 5 yr old why we want her to keep her mask on at school tomorrow because her 3 yo brother has no vaccine, all while not wanting to create potential guilt should she get covid and pass it to her brother.
@Annoyed_N_Tired @hkearl I'm Canadian, still waiting for your "facts".
@hkearl @MarieSnyder27 I am sorry that because of poor public policy and selfish citizens that your brave 3 yo has to shoulder the burden of keeping himself and your family safe from infection.
